typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as string,
		TerritoryID as string,
		SalesQuota as string,
		Bonus as string,
		CommissionPct as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesPerson
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Territory
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ShipMethod
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
Customers keyGenerate(output(id_sk_customer as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomers
SalesPerson keyGenerate(output(id_sk_salesperson as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeySalesPerson
Territory keyGenerate(output(id_sk_territory as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyTerritory
ShipMethod keyGenerate(output(id_sk_shipmethod as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyShipmethod
Product keyGenerate(output(id_sk_product as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyProduct
SurrogateKeyCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as string,
		PersonID as string,
		StoreID as string,
		TerritoryID as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		id_sk_customer as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['customers.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appcustomers
SurrogateKeySalesPerson sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['salesperson.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appsalesperson
SurrogateKeyTerritory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['territory.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appTerritory
SurrogateKeyShipmethod sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['shipmethod.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appShipmethod
SurrogateKeyProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['products.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appProduct
